DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Asia. The aim of this study is to assess patient satisfaction after switching to biphasic human insulin 30 treatment using the NovoLet® insulin device as treatment for diabetes mellitus under normal clinical practice setting.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study With Mixtard® 30 NovoLet® to Assess Patient Satisfaction
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin, pork; isophane insulin, pork drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Diabetes mellitus (type 1 or type 2) Patient not presently using Mixtard® 30 NovoLet®
